channel.title: Welcome Center on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome Center on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-10 West - Welcome Center/Rest Area
item.description: I-10 west - New Mexico Information Center/Rest Area.

item.title: Rest Area Access Road at BL-10
item.description: New Mexico Rest Area access road at BL-10. Turn right for I-10 East to Deming. Turn left for BL-10 east into Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 20A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 20A - New Mexico Information Center/Rest Area. Speed limit drops from 75 MPH to 65 MPH as I-10 enters Lordsburg.
